title: Help

embed.description: So, today someone gifted me pulsefire cait and ward skin. No notification popped up or anything thought that the client was bugged saying that I owned the skin when I don't. So I tried to go into a custom game , wouldn't let me make one.

body:
Just a repeat of what I said earlier. I also did the full repair option twice, that didn't fix it. I even got onto a different computer and tried to log in that failed also. Please Help ASAP ; ( I want to play 
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

replies.body:
I went ahead and checked for those Pulsefire Caitlyn gifts, and I do see that your account has them now so no worries there!

That weird authentication bug has been hitting a few people recently. I've gotten word from most that switching their region to something different and then changing it back to normal will force a patch and then they were able to log back in. Try out this method and let me know if that works!

R.I.P. I already did that I went to Oceania which made it force a patch. Then once that was done I switched back to North America tried to log on and still authenticating. What do you think I should do? Maybe try it again? Also thanks for the help
I tried it again made a sound like I had logged on but stayed the same. "Authenticating..." and just stayed there

Hmmmm this might actually be a different problem entirely then. Go ahead and hit up our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and they'll be able to go much more in depth than I can here on the boards.
Wait when we switch regions do we need to let it completely patch for that region or switch back to North America before it fully patches?
